title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server that lets you pull, run, and manage large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for the Ollama API; install from PyPI as ollama.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published on npm.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama models via the langchain-ollama PyPI package.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for chatting with Ollama models, packaged as a Docker image.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama, available on Maven Central.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive TUI for Ollama written in Go, supports chat history and themes.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET/C# client for Ollama, distributed via NuGet.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Lightweight Rust crate for chatting with Ollama over HTTP.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any server.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama containers for CI testing of LLM apps.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets teams chat with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that connects to a local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Custom n8n node to use Ollama models inside automation workflows.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds AI autocomplete powered by local Ollama models.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig client library for Ollama with cross-compilation support.
